input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "JAXXON"
Reference Product Name: "14k Gold Cuban Link Chain - 8mm"
Reference Product Description:
Introducing our gold 8mm Stainless Steel Cuban Link Chain â€“ a statement of timeless elegance and enduring strength. Crafted with precision and exceptional resiliency, this chain is designed to withstand tarnishing, corrosion, and daily wear. Elevate your style with its bold 8mm gauge and classic Cuban link design, making it the perfect choice for both casual and formal occasions.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='King Ice 18mm Miami Cuban Link Chain Hip Hop Jewelry'
  - Name='Miami Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='King Ice 12mm Miami Cuban Link Chain Hip Hop Jewelry'
  - Name='JAXXON 24" Cuban Link Silver Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Black Set'
  - Name='18K Micro Diamond Prong Cuban Necklace'
  - Name='Viper by GLD Products Men's Cuban Chain Necklace'
  - Name='18k South Beach Cuban Chain'
  - Name='Gld Signature Cuban Yellow Gold'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm + 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON Cuban Chain Stack'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Gold Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 10mm Cuban Gold Chain Set'
  - Name='Viper by GLD Products Men's Cuban Chain Necklace'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm + 10mm Iced Out Cuban'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 8mm Cuban Silver Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Solid Gold Cuban Link Chain'
  - Name='JAXXON 3mm Cuban Gold Chain Set'
  - Name='JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: King Ice 18mm Miami Cuban Link Chain Hip Hop Jewelry
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shares the Cuban link design and chain function but differs significantly in thickness (18mm vs 8mm) and likely target style (hip hop jewelry).
Matches the Cuban link chain type closely; no gauge or material specified but the product name implies high relevancy to the reference chain.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: King Ice 12mm Miami Cuban Link Chain Hip Hop Jewelry
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same Cuban link style and chain function; thickness closer (12mm vs 8mm) than 18mm version; also hip hop style but relevant.
Same brand and Cuban link style; differs in material (silver vs gold) and specific gauge not stated but length noted; highly relevant.
Same brand, exact gauge (8mm), Cuban link style; differs in color (black) but highly relevant as same core product type.
Cuban link style necklace but with added micro diamond prong embellishments which alters design; material is 18K gold which is a difference in construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Viper by GLD Products Men's Cuban Chain Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cuban link chain necklace serving similar purpose; different brand and specific gauge/width not specified; somewhat relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Viper by GLD Products Men's Cuban Chain Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Cuban link chain necklace serving similar purpose; different brand and specific gauge/width not specified; somewhat relevant.
Cuban chain style with 18k gold material similar to reference gold chain, close in category; gauge not specified.
Cuban link yellow gold chain implied; similar style and material but brand and gauge unknown.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 8mm + 10mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and gauge overlaps (8mm), same gold Cuban chain style but 'iced out' indicates added stones/embellishments, slightly different.
Same brand and Cuban chain style but 'stack' implies multiple chains or set, possibly different gauges or designs; moderately relevant.
Exact same brand, gauge (8mm), material (gold), and Cuban link chain set; almost identical product.
Same brand and material with Cuban gold chain but slightly thicker at 10mm vs 8mm; highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Viper by GLD Products Men's Cuban Chain Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: (Duplicate product name) Same as previous Viper product - relevant Cuban link chain but different brand and unknown gauge.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Viper by GLD Products Men's Cuban Chain Necklace
scores_with_rationales.rationale: (Duplicate product name) Same as previous Viper product - relevant Cuban link chain but different brand and unknown gauge.
Same brand and overlapping gauge; 'iced out' means embellished with stones, slightly different from plain chain but stylistically Cuban link gold.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Link Gold Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and style but thinner gauge (5mm vs 8mm) and iced out embellishments, relevant but less so due to size and styling.
Same brand, gauge (8mm), Cuban link style but silver material differs from gold; very relevant otherwise.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 3mm Solid Gold Cuban Link Chain
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and gold Cuban link chain but much thinner (3mm vs 8mm), less similar in silhouette but related.
Similar to previous, same brand and style but smaller gauge (3mm) making it less comparable in thickness and presence.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: JAXXON 5mm Iced Out Cuban Gold Set
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and gold Cuban chain set with smaller gauge (5mm) and iced out styling; related but differs in size and embellishments.
